title: Ingmar Visser
text:
Foto Sander Nieuwenhuys


I am an associate professor working in Developmental Psychology (in the Department of Psychology, Faculty of Social and Behavioral Sciences) at the University of Amsterdam.
Links

Babylab Amsterdam: my lab for infant research.
Manybabies: an organisation for collaborative infant research; I participate in a number of projects and lead one of them - Manybabies 3, studying rule-learning.
ManyManys: an organisation for collaborative comparative cognition research; I am one of the initiators of this and member of the advisory board.
College of psychology: I am the director this institute, responsible for the bachelor program.

title: Moving my website to github
text:
After using Wordpress for the longest time I decided it was time to move my website to github with the main advantage that it will be much easier to include R code on webpages and in blog posts such as below. I mostly followed these sites when setting up:

https://quarto.org/docs/websites/
https://samanthacsik.github.io/posts/2022-10-24-quarto-blogs/


1 + 1

[1] 2

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
